adept.common

Class Sentence

  • java.lang.Object
    • adept.common.Item
      • adept.common.HltContent
        • adept.common.Chunk
          • adept.common.Sentence
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Sentence
extends Chunk
implements Serializable
    The Sentence class extends Chunk and represents the output from sentence boundary detection algorithm.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
